name: Hkons Beanrunner
description:
parkour trough obstacles and try to get to the end as fast as possible or try to find the hidden coins as fast as possible.
there is also a maze u have to get trough, but the maze might move alittlebit while u are in there.
try to get an insane speedrun by using both the forward and sideways button to get even more speed.
in the game u might die of something stupid like a fake floor or something btw XD.
there also are enemys but im sure u can outsmart them and even use one of them.
its alittle frustrating btw hehehe
